name: Ignited Dreams (Demo)
description:
You're Mia, a teenage girl that suffers stress and depression caused by your "helicopter" dad. If your life wasn't miserable enough, the Final Exam of your highschool is just around the corner, and your father is forcing you to study beyond your limits. Exhausted, you fell asleep on the spot as you wonder if there's any way you could ever end your suffering.

But you then awaken yourself in a mysterious place, high above the clouds. Feeling different, you decided to explore this land. Later you found mysterious Stars scattered among these floating islands that is tricky to move around in. These stars also ignites memories of the past when your life wasn't so miserable. But what is this place anyways? What does it have to do with the exam, or Mia's life in general?

How to Play :

  1. Arrows to move and jump.
  2. Z to jump, or Up arrow.
  3. Shift to glide

This Game is meant for GGJ's May Day Mental Health Game Jam with the general theme implementation being that having dreams as you sleep can really drove you away from your mental problems, they don't fix it though.

Sadly, due to real life issues we had in the team this small demo is the only thing we manage to make.
